fn.p: Competing interest statement: The authors affiliated with Gilead Sciences are employees of the company and may own company stock; R.J. holds a patent on the use of remdesivir to treat Filovirus infections. The authors affiliated with NIH have no conflict of interest to report.
This article is a PNAS Direct Submission.
Data deposition: All data discussed here will be made available to readers upon request.
This article contains supporting information online at https://www.pnas.org/lookup/suppl/doi:10.1073/pnas.1922083117/-/DCSupplemental.
